name: Newborn Milk Maid Bonnet, Lace Mop Cap, Vintage Inspired Baby Girl Bonnet, Baby Photo Prop
description:
These hats are called "milk maid" hats by many but they make me think of little old ladies waaaaay back in the day before electricity, walking up in the middle of the night with a single candle in their hand heading for the "out-house", or maybe to the kitchen for a glass of milk, of course she would have a hat like this on her head. These are newborn size, and made with som color they are perfect for little newborn baby girls too! Hope you like them! :)

The fabrics in this hat is light weight sofdt turquoise cotton on one side and gorgeous white english lace fabric on the othere side, which keeps the vintage part of this bonnet very much alive still today. These hats were often made in lace fabrics such as this in various parts of the world, including Norway where these new ones were created just for you:)

~ It is revesible, turquoise on one side, white lace on the other, and with the natural holes and openings in the floral lace lets the turquoise shine through and ties the two sides together beautifully. 

~ It is in a Newborn size, can not be made bigger at the moment.

~ Washing: Should be handwashed because of the lace, can be ironed on a medium heat but only apply iron to the turquoise fabric and avoid applying it directly onto the lace fabric..

:: PHOTO CREDIT ::
Big thank you to photographer Marcy Spencer for the gorgeous photo. You can find more of her work here: http://www.facebook.com/msportraiture

name: Baby Boy Bow Tie in Orange, Classic Bowtie Bow Tie, Newborn to Toddler Photo Prop
description:
This bow tie was a new addition to Miss Lene's shop in 2012, I have as time went by revised the newborn size to better fit a newborn boy and not come out as too big in photos. So because of this the bow ties in this listing are sized to fit from approx 6 months to 5 years. The strap will fit newborns but the bow might look oversized. 

This little bow ties measures approx 9,5 cm / 3,7 iches) in width and 7cm / 2,7 inches at the highest. It's double stacked which means it has two individually sewn bows in different sizes stacked on top of each other slided through the center piece.

::NOTE:: The individual parts are NOT attached to each other by stitches but just slided through the center piece. They migh move a bit but are easy and quick to put back in place. Because of this it's probably best suited as a photography prop.

The LAST photo is to show how the strap and closure-clip look on this bow tie.

------------ 

COLORs and SIZE:

~ PHOTO 1: ORANGE GEOMETRIC DOTS: Bright Orange with dark rusty orange dots in a vague geometric pattern.


~ PHOTO 2: YELLOW with FLOWERS: Pale Yellow with various Yellows and Orange flowers.


~ PHOTO 3: ORANGE SWIRLS: Gorgeous Orange with Dotted Swirls in Yellow and Dark Rusty Orange

~ PHOTO 4: ORANGE with DOTS: Orange with Various Dots in solid Fuchsia and White, Dots with Fuchsia Stripes in them, Yellow Dots with Fuchsia Flecks in them And Yellow Dots with Tiny Fuchsia Dots in them.

------------

Size: The strap is adjustable from approx 18cm / 7,1 inches to approx 30 cm / 11,8 inches, Which sould be from 6 months to approx 5 years. The strap will fit a newborn too but the bow might then look slightly oversized.

BOW TIE PATTERN CREDIT: Bow Pattern by: http://www.etsy.com/shop/jlstephenscouture
 Strap is by me:)
